description:
A easy walking/bikeing trail leading to hardest rated trail in Fundy Park wich you are suposed to turn back on bike. going in to a gorge and across a Y in a river back up the other side conesting to a moderet bikeing/walking trail down to Point wolf. Appx 15k
It starts out as a easy trail leading in to the expert part of the trail where you are advised to turn back on bike wich is about 2k in. The trail connects to marvin lake trail which is another 8k (give or take) to point wolf. The part of the trail from bennet brook untill you decend down in to the gorge is rated as a #2 walking/bikeing  trail.
directions: Start at Bennet brook or at Point Wolf.
title: Bennet Brook to Point wolf (hard Way)
